Header: Lal Kantha in remand for causing an accident while under the influence of alcohol
Content: JVP Politburo Member K D Lal Kantha who was arrested for causing a motor accident while under the influence of alcohol, has been remanded till the 14th of this month. This was after been produced before the Anuradhapura Acting Magistrate today. 2 females travelling on a motorbike were injured, after colliding head on with the cab driven by Lal Kantha.
